ruling: - If you have [[A Legendary Ocean]] on the field and [[Elemental Hero Bubbleman]] is destroyed, you can activate [[D - Time]] and add a Level 4 or lower monster to your hand. If [[Elemental Hero Bubbleman]] is returned to the hand, then you can only add a Level 3 or lower monster to your hand because the effect of [[A Legendary Ocean]] still applies to [[Elemental Hero Bubbleman]] while he's in your hand.
